definition: to engage with secular society/to involve oneself in human affairs/to join the WTO (abbr. for 加入世界貿易組織|加入世界贸易组织[jia1 ru4 Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1])

sentences.english: The sky is blue and fields are green and laughter is the language of the world.
sentences.chinese: 藍天碧草之間笑聲成了世亖界通用的語言。

sentences.english: Here we arrived at end of a very scenic Tad Sae waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，我們在一個非常優美塔德世瀑布年底抵達。

sentences.english: Its age is late Early Triassic.
sentences.chinese: 其時代爲早三疊世晚期。

sentences.english: Russian cuisine is famous for its soups such as borscht and meat dishes.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯菜以它的各種湯和葷菜著名於世。

sentences.english: They chose a new pope, Benedict XVI.
sentences.chinese: 他們推選了一個新的教皇，本篤十六世。

sentences.english: Her spirit and compassion live on today.
sentences.chinese: 她的精神和悲天憫人至今仍留存於世。

sentences.english: If such a weapon is unleashed on the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果這樣的武器問了世。

sentences.english: Pray or ask for the long life of masters.
sentences.chinese: 祈願或請求上師長壽住世。

sentences.english: I am too old and too empty now to live much longer without you.
sentences.chinese: 失去了你，我如此衰老，如此空寂，已難久活人世。

sentences.english: Here by "the red tile greenery, the blue sea blue sky" is celebrated worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 這裏以“紅瓦綠樹，碧海藍天”著稱於世。

sentences.english: Markers sof the Anthropocene will surely be visible in the fossil record.
sentences.chinese: 人類世一定會在化石記錄中留下的可見的印記。

sentences.english: This article has a brief review on Holocene climate changes in Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 簡要地回顧了蒙古全新世氣候變化研究。

sentences.english: For the reef or gin, the similar samples are the Permian reefs found in Huatang and Meitian of South Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 其成因與湖南晚二疊世的華塘礁與梅田礁很相似。

sentences.english: A large amount of Dinosaurs skeleton fossils are discovered in Upper Cretaceous strata at the Meipu Town, Yunxian County of Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 湖北省鄖縣梅鋪鎮晚白堊世地層中發現大量恐龍化石。

sentences.english: We must perpetuate the Proper Dharma.
sentences.chinese: 一定要令正法常住於世。

sentences.english: Marseilles is a chief port and Lyon is an industrial center famous for its textiles.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽是最大的港口，而里昂則以紡織工業著稱於世。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
the fifth (of series of numbered kings)
to serve as an official/an official/the two chess pieces in Chinese chess guarding the "general" or "king" 將|将[jiang4]
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
